metadata.title: USN-6970-1 -- exfatprogs vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that exfatprogs incorrectly handled certain memory operations. If a user or automated system were tricked into handling specially crafted exfat partitions, a remote attacker could use this issue to cause exfatprogs to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6970-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  exfatprogs - 1.1.3-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
